Game.Name: Wai Wai World (Japan)
Game.plot: The player starts the game as Konami Man, and can switch between Konami Man and Konami Lady. If two players are gaming, then one will play as Konami Man and the other as Konami Lady. Both players are not able to switch characters until they rescue at least one character from one of the six levels. The player must play through six different selectable levels that take place in different Konami games and save that game's star character with a key who the player can then play as. Each character has different abilities to begin with as well as ones they can eventually gain. The player ventures through these first six levels in a sort on non-linear fashion with gameplay.Cheat: SuicideDuring game, hold Up + A + B then press Start to commit suicide.Cheat: Final Stage Password With All ItemsAt the password screen, press Up or Down the following number of times to change it to the respective Japanese character:Down 15 times. Up 1 time. Down 13 times. Up 18 times. Down 3 times. Up 18 times. Down 8 times. Up 2 times. Down 17 times. Up 1 time. Up 15 times. Up 3 times. Down 2 times. Up 19 times.
